requirement_tested: Implement a search functionality allowing users to input stock codes or names
user_persona: A financial analyst who needs quick access to stock data.
user_goal: To find information about a specific stock by typing its name or code into the search bar.

narrative_steps.title: Visiting Homepage
narrative_steps.description: Alex navigates to the stock report website and sees the centered search bar at the top of the page.
narrative_steps.action: Observe the presence and styling of the search bar.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The search bar is visible with a placeholder 'Enter stock code or name' and a magnifying glass icon on the right, styled with white background and navy border.

narrative_steps.title: Focusing Search Bar
narrative_steps.description: Alex clicks on the search bar to begin entering a stock name.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the search input field.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The input field gains focus, ready for text entry.

narrative_steps.title: Entering Stock Name
narrative_steps.description: Alex starts typing 'Apple Inc.' into the search bar.
narrative_steps.action: Type 'Apple Inc.' into the search input.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: As Alex types, the system begins filtering suggestions from the stock database in real-time.

requirement_tested: Provide auto-suggest or autocomplete feature for stock search inputs
user_persona: A day trader looking up multiple stocks quickly.
user_goal: To efficiently select a stock from a list of auto-suggested matches while typing.

narrative_steps.title: Typing Partial Stock Name
narrative_steps.description: Jordan begins typing 'Tesla' into the search bar.
narrative_steps.action: Type 'Tesla' into the search input field.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A dropdown list appears beneath the search bar showing matching stock symbols and names like 'TSLA - Tesla, Inc.'

narrative_steps.title: Hovering Over Suggestions
narrative_steps.description: Jordan moves the mouse over one of the suggestions to preview it.
narrative_steps.action: Hover over the suggestion 'TSLA - Tesla, Inc.'
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The suggestion is highlighted with a light navy background (#E6E6FA) and darker text shade.

narrative_steps.title: Selecting Suggested Stock
narrative_steps.description: Satisfied with the match, Jordan clicks on the suggested stock entry.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the 'TSLA - Tesla, Inc.' suggestion.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The search bar is populated with 'TSLA', and the dropdown list disappears.

requirement_tested: Create a stock information summary display showing basic stock details
user_goal: To view essential stock information after selecting a stock.

narrative_steps.title: Selecting a Stock
narrative_steps.description: Taylor has searched for and selected 'MSFT' from the suggestions.
narrative_steps.action: Press Enter or click away from the search bar after selecting 'MSFT'.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A responsive card component appears below the search bar.

narrative_steps.title: Viewing Stock Summary
narrative_steps.description: Taylor looks at the newly displayed stock summary card.
narrative_steps.action: Read the contents of the stock summary card.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The card displays key-value pairs such as Symbol (MSFT), Name (Microsoft Corporation), Current Price, Change, % Change, Previous Close, Open, Volume, Market Cap, and P/E Ratio, all styled with white background and navy border.

requirement_tested: Include market trends visualization section in stock reports
user_persona: A portfolio manager analyzing long-term performance.
user_goal: To understand historical price movements through visual charts.

narrative_steps.title: Locating Market Trends Section
narrative_steps.description: Casey scrolls down to the 'Market Trends' section in the generated report.
narrative_steps.action: Scroll to the 'Market Trends' heading.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A section titled 'Market Trends' is visible with a placeholder image before the chart loads.

narrative_steps.title: Observing Loaded Chart
narrative_steps.description: After a moment, the placeholder is replaced by an interactive chart.
narrative_steps.action: Wait for the chart to load.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: An interactive line chart showing price movement over time replaces the placeholder image.

narrative_steps.title: Interacting With Chart
narrative_steps.description: Casey hovers over a point on the chart to get more detail.
narrative_steps.action: Hover over a data point on the chart.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A tooltip appears displaying the date and value details for that point.

requirement_tested: Integrate financial data display including key financial metrics and ratios
user_persona: A financial analyst evaluating company health.
user_goal: To review important financial indicators in a structured format.

narrative_steps.title: Finding Financial Data Section
narrative_steps.description: Riley scans the report for the 'Financial Data' section.
narrative_steps.action: Scroll to the 'Financial Data' heading.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A table labeled 'Financial Data' is visible with headers in navy and white text.

narrative_steps.title: Reviewing Metrics
narrative_steps.description: Riley examines the rows of financial metrics presented in the table.
narrative_steps.action: Read the values in the financial data table.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The table shows key financial indicators like Revenue, Net Income, EPS, Debt-to-Equity, ROE, Dividend Yield, and Beta, with alternating row colors for readability.

requirement_tested: Offer customizable report format selection options
user_persona: A researcher preparing materials for different audiences.
user_goal: To choose the appropriate format for exporting the stock report.

narrative_steps.title: Viewing Format Options
narrative_steps.description: Morgan notices the 'Report Format' section with radio buttons for PDF, Excel, and HTML.
narrative_steps.action: Look at the available format options.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Three horizontal radio buttons are displayed under the heading 'Report Format': PDF, Excel, and HTML, with navy outlines and styling.

narrative_steps.title: Selecting Preferred Format
narrative_steps.description: Morgan decides to generate the report in PDF format for easy sharing.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the 'PDF' radio button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The 'PDF' radio button becomes filled with solid navy, indicating it is selected.

requirement_tested: Provide content selection controls for users to choose report sections
user_persona: A busy executive needing only core insights.
user_goal: To customize the report to include only relevant sections.

narrative_steps.title: Identifying Content Selection Area
narrative_steps.description: Quinn locates the 'Choose Sections' checklist below the format options.
narrative_steps.action: Scan for the content selection controls.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A vertical checklist titled 'Choose Sections' is visible with checkboxes for Basic Info, Market Trends, Financial Data, and News Summary.

narrative_steps.title: Customizing Report Contents
narrative_steps.description: Quinn selects only 'Basic Info' and 'Financial Data' to keep the report concise.
narrative_steps.action: Click the checkboxes next to 'Basic Info' and 'Financial Data'.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The selected checkboxes show navy checkmarks, indicating those sections will be included in the report.

requirement_tested: Generate automated stock reports based on user-selected criteria
user_persona: A junior analyst tasked with producing daily reports.
user_goal: To produce a tailored stock report using selected parameters.

narrative_steps.title: Finalizing Selections
narrative_steps.description: Drew confirms the chosen stock, format, and content sections.
narrative_steps.action: Verify selections for stock symbol, report format, and included sections.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: All selections are clearly marked and ready for report generation.

narrative_steps.title: Triggering Report Generation
narrative_steps.description: Drew clicks the 'Generate Report' button to compile the customized report.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Generate Report' button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A loading spinner briefly appears while the backend processes the request.

narrative_steps.title: Receiving Generated Report
narrative_steps.description: The loading finishes and the compiled report is displayed.
narrative_steps.action: Observe the main viewing area.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The completed report, reflecting Drew's selections, is shown in the main viewing area.

requirement_tested: Display generated reports in a clean, readable format
user_persona: A compliance officer reviewing investment documentation.
user_goal: To read the generated report comfortably without distractions.

narrative_steps.title: Viewing Generated Report
narrative_steps.description: Bailey sees the newly generated stock report fill most of the screen.
narrative_steps.action: Look at the report preview area.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The report occupies the main viewing space with clean typography, consistent spacing, navy headings, and dark gray body text on a white background.

narrative_steps.title: Navigating Long Reports
narrative_steps.description: Bailey needs to read through several pages of financial data.
narrative_steps.action: Use the scrollbar to move through the report.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The report scrolls smoothly without pagination issues, maintaining readability throughout.

requirement_tested: Ensure white background color throughout the website interface
user_persona: A UX designer auditing site consistency.
user_goal: To verify that the entire website maintains a uniform white background.

narrative_steps.title: Inspecting Homepage Background
narrative_steps.description: Cameron visits the homepage and checks the overall background color.
narrative_steps.action: Observe the background of the homepage.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The entire homepage features a pure white background (#FFFFFF) with no other background colors used except for interactive highlights.

narrative_steps.title: Checking Report Page Background
narrative_steps.description: Cameron navigates to a generated report page and inspects its background.
narrative_steps.action: Navigate to a report page and observe its background.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The report page also uses a pure white background (#FFFFFF) consistently with the rest of the site.

requirement_tested: Apply navy color scheme to all UI components and elements
user_persona: A brand compliance specialist checking design adherence.
user_goal: To ensure all UI elements use the correct navy color theme.

narrative_steps.title: Examining Button Styling
narrative_steps.description: Dana inspects various buttons across the interface for color consistency.
narrative_steps.action: Look at buttons such as 'Login', 'Generate Report', and 'Export'.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: All buttons use navy (#000080) for borders, icons, and primary text as per the component color palette.

narrative_steps.title: Verifying Icon Colors
narrative_steps.description: Dana checks icons like the search icon and download icon for proper coloring.
narrative_steps.action: Observe the color of icons throughout the interface.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Icons such as the search icon and download icon are rendered in navy (#000080) to align with the UI theme.

requirement_tested: Include stock chart visualization for price movements and trends
user_persona: A technical trader relying on visual analysis tools.
user_goal: To analyze stock price behavior using adjustable time-range charts.

narrative_steps.title: Viewing Initial Chart
narrative_steps.description: Rowan sees the static chart placeholder below the stock summary.
narrative_steps.action: Locate the chart area beneath the stock summary card.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A chart area with a static placeholder image is visible, along with adjacent time-range toggle buttons.

narrative_steps.title: Adjusting Time Range
narrative_steps.description: Rowan wants to see yearly performance and clicks the '1Y' button.
narrative_steps.action: Click the '1Y' time-range button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The chart updates dynamically to reflect the selected one-year time period.

requirement_tested: Provide export functionality for generated reports (PDF, Excel, etc.)
user_persona: An office manager distributing reports to team members.
user_goal: To download the generated report in a preferred file format.

narrative_steps.title: Locating Export Buttons
narrative_steps.description: Jamie finds the export options at the bottom of the report preview.
narrative_steps.action: Scroll to the bottom of the report preview.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Two side-by-side buttons labeled 'Export to PDF' and 'Export to Excel' are visible, both featuring a download icon and navy text.

narrative_steps.title: Downloading Report
narrative_steps.description: Jamie chooses to download the report as a PDF for broad compatibility.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Export to PDF' button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The browser initiates the download of the current report in PDF format.

requirement_tested: Implement user authentication and profile management system
user_persona: A returning user accessing saved preferences.
user_goal: To securely log in and access personalized settings.

narrative_steps.title: Opening Login Modal
narrative_steps.description: Alex clicks the 'Sign In' link in the header to access the account.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Sign In' link.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A modal form opens with fields for Email and Password, styled with the navy theme.

narrative_steps.title: Submitting Credentials
narrative_steps.description: Alex enters their registered email and password and submits the form.
narrative_steps.action: Fill in email and password fields, then click the 'Login' button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: If valid, the user is authenticated and redirected to their dashboard or previous location.

requirement_tested: Add bookmarking or watchlist feature for frequently accessed stocks
user_persona: A frequent visitor tracking favorite stocks.
user_goal: To save a stock to a personal watchlist for quick future access.

narrative_steps.title: Finding Bookmark Icon
narrative_steps.description: Jordan locates the bookmark icon next to a stock entry in the search results.
narrative_steps.action: Look for the bookmark icon beside a stock listing.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: An empty outline bookmark icon is visible next to the stock symbol/name.

narrative_steps.title: Adding Stock to Watchlist
narrative_steps.description: Jordan clicks the bookmark icon to add the stock to their watchlist.
narrative_steps.action: Click the bookmark icon.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The icon changes to a filled bookmark, and the stock is added to the user's personal watchlist in the database.
